-- ============================================
-- TC-02: Project Invitations (UI)
-- ============================================
-- Prerequisites: run seed-test-cases.sh first
-- (creates tc02_hello_world table and job)
--
-- Log in as alice in one browser, bob in another.
--
-- STEP 1: Create project as alice, invite bob
--   EXPECTED: invitation listed on bob's SSB
--
-- STEP 2: Accept invitation as bob
--   EXPECTED: project appears on bob's SSB
--
-- STEP 3: Create project as bob, invite alice, then cancel
--   EXPECTED: invitation deleted
--
-- STEP 4: Repeat but decline as alice instead of cancel
--   EXPECTED: invitation deleted
--
-- STEP 5: Switch to shared project as alice, verify
--   tc02_hello_world table and job are visible.
--   Switch as bob, verify resources visible.
--   EXPECTED: bob can see project resources
--
-- STEP 6: Start tc_02_hello_world job as alice
--   EXPECTED: job is read-only for bob
-- ============================================
SELECT 'See comments above for UI test steps' AS instructions;
